oai_dc:dc.dc:title: al- Jawhar al-munaḍḍad fī maʻná Qul huwa Allāhu aḥad / li-muʼallifihā Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Biqāʻī al-Dimashqī al-Ṣūfī : manuscript, 1641
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Biqāʻī, Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad , active 1641
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Sufi commentary on Chapter 112 of the Qur'an.
Written in a naskh hand in black ink, 15 lines per page, with catchwords on the verso of each leaf.
The ms. is in a fragile state, water-stained and with some worm damage. There is a slight loss of text.
Laid paper. 17.7 x 13.3 cm. (13.5 x 8 cm.).
A quotation (fāʼidah) from al-Shaykh al-Akbar [i.e., Ibn ʻArabī] in a different hand is on f. 1r.
According to the colophon (f. 6r), this is an autograph copy completed in 21 Ṣafar 1051 AH [May 31, 1641 AD] upon request of Aḥmad al-Sarākisī (f. 6r).
Folios were misplaced during repair. Their correct order is: 1 5 3 4 2 6.
MS Arab 132. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sufism
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: بقاعي، أحمد بن أحمد بن أحمد، , active 1641
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: جوهر المنضد في معنى قل هو الله أحد / لمؤلفها أحمد بن أحمد بن أحمد البقاعي : مخطوطة، 1641
